name: PermitFlow
headline: TurboTax for Construction Permitting
description: Intuitive workflow software that helps general contractors and developers identify the optimal permitting process and needed application forms for a particular project, and then easily fill the relevant paperwork to prepare a robust application package.

founders.name: Francis Thumpasery, Founder
founders.description: Francis held a number of operations, product, and investing roles, working with product and management teams at multiple application software companies. He has studied at Harvard and Stanford.

founders.name: Samuel Lam, Founder
founders.description: Sam developed workflow tooling for reporting and payments with unique company and municipality requirements as a software engineer at Uber Eats. He previously co-founded NXTFactor, an online marketing agency and studied Computer Science & Statistics at Harvard.

generated_description:
PermitFlow is a New York-based startup founded in 2021, currently part of Y Combinator's W22 batch. The company operates with a mission that's as bold as it is clear: to be the **TurboTax for Construction Permitting**. In other words, it aims to revolutionize how construction permits are managed, making the process much simpler for developers and contractors. 

**What Do They Do?**  
PermitFlow provides intuitive workflow software that helps general contractors and developers navigate the complex permitting landscape. It serves as a guide for understanding the optimal permitting processes and necessary application forms for various projects. The platform allows users to fill out the required paperwork easily, creating a robust application package that increases the chances of approval.

**Team and Leadership**  
With a growing team of 50 employees, PermitFlow is led by experienced industry professionals. Notably, Tom Blomfield serves as a Group Partner, bringing valuable expertise to the team.

**Current Offerings**  
The platform currently features a wide array of services, including:
- **Permit Research**: Essential for identifying requirements for specific projects across municipalities.
- **Permit Preparation & Submittals**: Streamlines the creation and submission of applications, ensuring they are error-free and ready for review.
- **Permit Management & Monitoring**: Keeps users informed of the status of their submissions, providing transparency and predictability.
- **Permit Data**: Offers insights and data essential for making informed decisions.
- **Expediting Services**: Helps speed up the permit process, allowing projects to move forward more quickly.

PermitFlow is also active in providing resources like the eBook titled **"Master the Permitting Process: Proven Strategies for Streamlining Approvals."**

**Why Choose PermitFlow?**
The software makes the often tedious and time-consuming permitting process fast and simple. By managing all aspects of permit preparation, submission, and tracking from a single platform, PermitFlow takes the guesswork out of the job and allows builders to focus on what they do best—constructing. They help save valuable time and reduce the amount of paperwork, which can shave weeks off the permitting cycle.

So, if you're in the construction business and tired of the challenges that permits bring, PermitFlow might just be your next best ally. Want to learn more? Head over to their website at [PermitFlow.com](http://www.permitflow.com) and get started!
